title: Detective Classics

renewed-contributions.title: The Murder of a Midget
renewed-contributions.note: This novel was also published as a book in 1931, and there is an active renewal for that book.

additional-note: There are no contribution renewals that specifically mention this magazine, but we did find a renewal for the novel above, after seeing it in the FictionMags contents listings for this magazine.  It might be worth double-checking the copyright status of whatever novel appears in an issue of interest, if the issue is recent enough that a renewal might be active.
